column3: 9 Place-Place 5 meatballs in a Microwave-safe plate
7 Cut-Cut 1/4 medium carrot into short, thin strips
2 Mix-Mix 1/4 cup sweet-and-sour sauce and 1/2 teaspoon soy sauce in a small bowl
11 Pour-Pour the sauces over the meatballs
14 Microwave-Microwave the plate, covered, on high for 5 minutes
15 Stir-Stir the contents in the microwave with a spoon
14 Microwave-Microwave the plate, covered, on high for 5 minutes
